content: crochet cotton coaster - a simple project ideal for putting your cups glasses etc on the pattern instructions are in both usa and uk formats written in english **please note that the pattern is available for free on my blog www crochetncreate com 1 ** finished size approx - 4 5 inches diameter level intermediate copyright ©2020 crochetncreate do not sell reproduce or copy this pattern in any way you are welcome to sell anything you make from this pattern 1 https //crochetncreate com/crochet-cotton-coaster-pattern/
